title: Young Black Lawyers Organizing Coalition (YBLOC) Legal Resistance Summit
summary: A coalition of 287 civil rights attorneys and constitutional law experts convened in Washington D.C. to establish a coordinated national legal resistance infrastructure, focusing on protecting democratic institutions. Led by Abdul Dosunmu and featuring prominent civil rights lawyers, the summit built on YBLOC's grassroots organizing strategy to address emerging challenges to civil rights and democratic processes.
